summary: This is an email chain from August 6, 2020, forwarding a news article about Prince Andrew and Jeffrey Epstein. It references a claim by attorney Lisa Bloom that investigators did not want to interview one of her clients, and includes a link to a Newsweek article containing allegations from a witness.

persons.name: Lisa Bloom
persons.context: Attorney who allegedly told a reporter that investigators did not want to interview one of her clients. Mentioned in the email forwarding a news article.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Subject of allegations in a forwarded Newsweek article, described as being at a club with Jeffrey Epstein and a young girl according to a witness.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the forwarded Newsweek article alleges Prince Andrew was at a club with him and a young girl.

connections.description: Alleged to have been together at a club with a young girl, according to a witness cited in the forwarded Newsweek article.
Lisa Bloom is an attorney mentioned in connection with the Epstein case, representing a client she claims investigators did not want to interview.

events.title: Email Forwarding Newsweek Article
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a Newsweek article containing allegations from a witness about Prince Andrew being at a club with Jeffrey Epstein and a young girl. The email also references a claim by attorney Lisa Bloom.

keyFacts: Attorney Lisa Bloom claimed investigators did not want to interview one of her clients in the Epstein case.
A Newsweek article from August 2020 contained allegations from a witness that Prince Andrew was at a club with Jeffrey Epstein and a young girl.
The document is an internal email chain forwarding media coverage and legal developments related to the Epstein case.
